Description:
Location a prize plus enviable size
It's not surprising Strathfieldsaye continues to appeal, offering a peaceful country lifestyle focussed on families and a strong sense of community. Coupled with numerous local conveniences, it's also merely 7.5 kilometres from comprehensive amenities in central Bendigo. However, this property has many more particularly attractive attributes to tempt city-dwellers slightly further afield to its enviable address.
Firstly, at 1050m2 (approximately), the dream of owning quarter acre in a terrific location can now be realised. Set back from the road by a 40 metre driveway allowance enhances privacy and greatly reduces traffic noise. At 5 metres wide, it could perhaps even accommodate dual lanes!
Prospects of building within a fairly square site measuring 26x31 metres enables extensive variety of prospective floorplans. Mature gum trees from bordering neighbours borrow a superb backdrop for future landscaping and outdoor living, plus pleasant views from indoors. Saving costs, some boundaries are already fenced, and all services are readily available to the block.
Dinner and drinks at Braidie's Tavern are well within staggering distance and Greater Bendigo National Park is just a few paddocks away! Other local amenities include pre and primary schools plus bowls club is a 6 minute cycle or 18 walk, with football and netball club even closer. An extra 200 metres puts shops and supermarket on the list. La Trobe uni is an 18 minute bus or bike ride from here, add 6 to reach central Bendigo by the same means, or drive the 7.5 kilometres in under 10 minutes.
So, what's not to love?
Insights: 294 Guys Hill Road, Strathfieldsaye VIC 3551 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
ELITE HIGH QUALITY HOME
Located in an elite residential estate is this quality built 5 year old home, within minutes walking distance to the local Schools, shopping center, sports facilities and park lands.
There was definitely no holding back when adding the upgrades to this build, consisting of raised ceiling height, LED down-lights, sandstone tile feature walls, stone bench tops and beautiful fixtures throughout.
Boasting four bedrooms, the master bedroom consists of walk-in robe and ensuite with a double vanity and shower, the remaining three bedrooms all have built in robes.
The kitchen is open plan with 900mm gas cook top, dual electric ovens, dishwasher, large stone island bench with a double sink and walk-in pantry.
Central gas heating and evaporative cooling for year round comfort.
Additional to the four bedrooms in this plan is a study and three separate living areas, one close to the Master suite, one close to the rear bedrooms and one off the open plan Kitchen. leading outside through glass sliding doors is the fantastic alfresco area. The Alfresco is under the roof line of the home consisting of an outdoor kitchen fitted with a stone bench top, sink with hot and cold running water, plumbed BBQ, merbau deck and complete with ceiling fan and down-lights.
Outside is a tasteful, low maintenance, fully landscaped yard.
Double garage with remote entry for secure parking.
A absolute must to inspect this fabulous home.
Internal area
30m²

Description:
BENDIGO REGION - TREE CHANGE
This well appointed home is in the main street of the historic goldfields town of Tarnagulla and great value. Lounge with built-in wood heater and wall air conditioner, kitchen with electric stove, rangehood and original black cast iron wood stove plus ample cupboard space. Main bedroom with adjacent semi ensuite and wall air conditioner. Bedrooms two and three are a good size plus rear bungalow style bedroom with wall air conditioner and another bathroom and toilet. Large rear fernery and patio area, needing new plants, plus a man cave with a spa is at the rear of the house. The block has rear access from the laneway with the 12M x8M galvanised iron shed which has power and part brick and concrete floor. Two rainwater tanks and room for a caravan and boat. Bosch gas hot water service, 12 solar panels, good Colorbond fencing, plus town facilities and a great garden area completes the picture. Come and Inspect.
Internal area
25m²

Description:
Toolleen District Properties
"Nolans" 63.6 Ha/157 Acres (Approx) - Axedale-Crosbie Road, Toolleen.
"Allans" 129.4 Ha/320 Acres (Approx) - Axedale-Toolleen Road, Toolleen - UNDER CONTRACT
An opportunity to secure excellent grazing/woolgrowing country in a highly sought-after area.
"Nolans" 63.6Ha / 157Acres -
Located just 300m from the Northern Highway, 5km south of Toolleen and 19km North of Heathcote. A very affordable parcel of rural land ideally suited to grazing all types of livestock. Mostly cleared land with a few small areas of scattered trees. The gently sloping terrain is fenced into one main paddock and there are two catchment dams. A corner site with extensive road frontage and potential to build a dwelling and farm buildings (STCA).
"Allans" 129.4Ha / 320Acres - UNDER CONTRACT
Comprises mostly cleared land with some areas of native bush providing natural shade and shelter for livestock. Fenced predominately into one main paddock with opportunities to further develop the property to achieve its highest potential. The gently undulating terrain provides excellent catchment and run-off to two existing dams.
Suitable for the construction of a home and shedding (STCA).

Description:
Hospital precinct, large home on a large block
To enquire on this property just TEXT (no calls) this Code *CHQV* to the mobile number displayed for an instant response, or use the 'Get in touch/email agent tab to send an email.
This home comes with 3 bedrooms, all with mirrored BIR, 2 bathrooms and 3 toilets.The kitchen is well catered for with tonnes of cupboards and a large 3 door pantry. The large lounge comes with an open fireplace and gas heater and summer is catered for with ducted evaporative air conditioning.
Freshly painted, newish carpet and floor coverings as well as a recently installed ensuite complete this property
The 942m2 block comes with plenty of options; a large backyard for the kids or to develop as the property comes with council approved plans for 2 townhouses.
Rent the property whilst building as the tenants are a dream and a pleasure to deal with.
Inspection welcomed. No! Mandatory

Description:
STROLL TO LAKE WEEROONA!
Perfectly positioned on the city fringe and a short walk to Lake Weeroona and the Bendigo Hospital is this ideal first home or investment opportunity. Offering 3 generous bedrooms and spacious lounge area with feature Gas Log Fire the home is warm, inviting and has had some recent improvements meaning you can simply move in and enjoy the home as it is while offering scope to add your own touch.
Sitting on the high side of the street, the home offers sensational views across Bendigo and will appeal to those who love to entertain with a raised deck at the rear. Inside the property features well proportioned zones and large feature windows that allow the home to fill with loads of natural sun light.
New insulation has been added while recently added paint and floor coverings give this home a fresh appeal. A rare opportunity to secure a home at an affordable price in such a high-demand area.
Other features include:
- Ducted refrigerated heating and cooling
- Gas Log fire in lounge
- New guttering and fascia
- Updated power box

Description:
Excellent Investment Opportunity - Purchase Individually or as a Whole
Exceptional returns could be achieved with this outstanding and rare opportunity to purchase a block of 3 units offering a variety of floorplans and a convenient position just 5 mins from the Bendigo CBD.
The properties are being offered as a whole (all 3 units) with a price range of $530,000 - $560,000.
Or individually as follows:
*Unit 1 is a 1 bedroom brick unit with open plan kitchen/meals and living, separate laundry and bathroom, plus a large bedroom approx 5m x 3m in size. Individual price: $130,000 - $140,000.
*Unit 2 is a 2 bedroom brick unit with open plan kitchen/meals, separate laundry and bathroom and undercover car accommodation. Individual price: $170,000 - $180,000.
*Unit 3 is a 4 bedroom brick unit with large open plan kitchen/meals and living, separate bathroom and laundry, along with undercover car accommodation. $230,000 - $240,000
The units are solid in construction, and the long term benefits are considerable for those looking to purchase all 3, with flexibility of re-sale down the track. Individually these units offer exceptional and affordable prospects for those looking to enter the market for a residence, or investment purposes.
Short settlement and vacant possession for all 3 units is available.
*Contact Bawa on 0402 206 745 to arrange an inspection of all 3 units.

Description:
JUST LOOK AT THE POSITION
Nestled in a quite part of Central Bendigo is the absolute "one-off" parcel of land only a short walk to Bendigo Train Station, Market Place, Mitchell, Mundy and Williamson Streets - yep right in the mix!!
219m2 with all services handy; nestled amongst lovely period homes and in lovely quiet street.
A genuine chance to secure land in such a central position and build something that suits you!!
There is a planning permit with plans available.

Description:
CHOICE FLORA HILL LAND
Landbank or build your next home in one of Bendigo's most popular locations. 13 Hesse Avenue, Flora Hill is a fully serviced, level and cleared lot measuring approx 700m².
Perfectly positioned in the heart of Flora Hill, it is close to all amenities with local shops, Strath and Kennington Village shopping centres just around the corner. Educational institutions abound with Bendigo South East College, Spring Gully Primary, Victory Christian College and LaTrobe University all within easy reach while sports fans will find many sporting facilities in the neighbourhood and nature lovers can spend their weekends walking or cycling the slopes of the One Tree Hill Regional Park.
Adjoining lot approx 1501m² also available for purchase.
Ready for an immediate start or an ideal future investment call for more details.

Description:
FOH Grant Eligible Or Fantastic Investment Opportunity.
Being less than 5 years old and being the first time on the market, first home buyers may be eligible for grants and/or stamp duty savings with this property.
The suburb of Huntly is growing in popularity day on day and just 15 minutes from the Bendigo CBD, makes 172 Sawmill Road a fantastic opportunity.
You will appreciate the well thoughtful floor plan and space for growing families.
The big size master bedroom offers walk-in robe and ensuite while the remaining three bedrooms
Entertainers kitchen looks across the living zone, with gas appliances and ample bench space, pantry, breakfast bar and laundry access.
The large living zone is accompanied by split system air-conditioner and ducted heating.
Families will love the stylish bathroom with a large tub, and separate toilet
While investors will love hard-wearing tiles through all high traffic areas, and low maintenance yard.
Low maintenance backyard offers secure Colorbond fence on all sides.
The property also features a double lock up garage with internal access through the laundry directly to the kitchen, perfect for the grocery run!
Sure to impress upon inspection. Please contact Sacha to arrange a time!

Description:
Well sized family home!
Located in the quiet neighborhood of Saltbush Street, Jackass Flat and within close proximity to Creative Garden Bendigo child care center, Neangar Park Golf Club and only a short 11 minute drive to the North Bendigo hospital precinct & Bendigo CBD. This modern 4 bedroom home is a sure bet to appeal to many walks of life whether it be first home buyers, investors or downsizers.
Allocated on an ideal low maintenance 400 Sqm (approximately) corner block the property is an ideal size inside and out. The interior of the home is well proportioned and offers a practical layout from start to finish with 4 generously proportioned bedrooms. The master bedroom is completed with walk through robe and large ensuite with double vanity. The remaining 3 bedrooms are all completed with sizable built in robes and large windows for ample natural light.
The property offers two living zones and a large open plan kitchen/dining space with enough room for the whole family. The kitchen is finished with stone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel stove and oven and plenty of storage space allowing a great look and practicality.
Flowing on from the dining space you will find the substantial outdoor alfresco area with tiled flooring and ceiling fan, the perfect space to unwind after a big day! The backyard space has been landscaped for minimal garden maintenance and a 'set and forget approach' thanks to the crushed rock and fake turfed area.
Currently tenanted at $330 p/w this property presents as a sound investment or great home with only one owner! Don't miss your chance to secure this cracking 7 year old near new, modern property, inquire today!
(ENOE)

Description:
SOLD OFF MARKET
Another Property Sold Off Market by Jayden Donaldson - McKean McGregor. Contact him today to see where your property sits in the market.
Positioned in a lovely court in popular Strathfieldsaye, this immaculate property is just minutes from everything you need. Youll have all of the amenities that Strathfieldsaye has to offer, right at your fingertips - Cafes, Bakeries, Schools and Healthcare, just to name just a few. Take advantage of the Governments first home buyers grant, available on this newly built and never lived in property. The contemporary open plan design maximizes the size of the allotment, which is located close to the fantastic local sports oval the ideal space to go for a run or have a kick of the footy.
Entering through the front door youll walk into a light and welcoming entry hall, off of which youll find the first of the homes four bedrooms which includes a built in robe and leads across to the separate three piece bathroom and toilet. Continuing further into the home is a second well-proportioned bedroom with built in robe. The entry hall also offers secure access to the house via the double garage, and includes a large linen closet. Walking down the end of the entry hall leads you into the heart of the home where you can enjoy the benefits and style of open plan living. Adjacent to the homes third bedroom is the bright and modern kitchen, which includes quality fixtures and fittings and is a space the whole Family can enjoy together. With large windows and sliding doors leading you to the outdoor entertaining area, the dining room is flooded with natural light and adds to the cozy but sophisticated ambience of the home.
The master bedroom is privately positioned at the rear of the house, off of the living and dining area, and features a substantial walk-in robe and modern ensuite.
Additional features include:
- Ducted heating and split system cooling
- Luxuriously appointed kitchen including gas cooktop, 900mm oven and dishwasher.
- Master with Ensuite and walk-in-robe
Enjoy the convenience of this highly sought after location, just minutes from local schools, Strathfieldsaye shopping precinct, Medical Practitioners, bus stops and more, whilst also being less than 15 minutes from Bendigos CBD. From a first home buyer looking for a quality home in a lovely location, to the keen investor, this home is sure to impress.

Description:
Spacious & Stylish Family Home In An Exclusive Location
Immaculately presented, this four bedroom home is an established, ready made option within the popular area of Strathfieldsaye.
It has been stylishly finished throughout, creating a classic foundation on which any family could envisage creating a new life together.
With four bedrooms and three living areas, as well as a lot of about 833 square meters, space abounds, and thanks to the quality of the build the property is sure to stand the test of time.
There is the open-plan main area comprising kitchen, dining and living room.
The large windows overlook the landscaped back yard and adjoining alfresco area creating that feeling of inclusion yet giving everyone their own space to relax or play.
The adults can also enjoy the formal lounge room while the children retreat to the home theater room where there's room for friends.
There has been no scrimping on size with the generously proportioned main bedroom which features walk-in-robe and ensuite, while all the other bedrooms have built in robes.
Other features include ducted heating and cooling, and a double garage with internal access.
Call today for an inspection; this impressive property will not disappoint.
* 4 Bedrooms & 3 living areas
* Huge master bedroom with sitting area
* And an enormous walk in robe, luxurious ensuite
* With double vanity, double shower bath and separate toilet
* Spacious formal lounge area
* Open plan kitchen meals and living
* 900 mm oven, stone bench tops and walk in pantry
* Fully equipped home theatre room
* Large 833 m2 landscaped allotment
* Beautiful alfresco area partially covered
* Quality blinds and light fitting through out
* Internal access from the double garage
* Close to amenities, shops , public transport and schools
* Must see to truly appreciate - call for inspection

Description:
Surrounded by Nature
Privacy, space and quiet while still having a central feel, 18 Harvey Street offers the best of both worlds.
Set on a generous corner block and surrounded by nature sits this well-established weatherboard three-bedroom home boasting a modern light and bright kitchen, large covered entertaining area, timber decked alfresco and an impressive large shed.
Stepping through the front gate you'll admire the manicured gardens and inviting front veranda; the ideal spot to enjoy your morning coffee.
Inside you are greeted by beautiful polished floor boards, and through the double sliding doors is your lounge room to the right. The kitchen is a standout with its naturally lit space, abundance of storage options, stainless steel appliances, marble look benchtops and extra wide fridge nook.
The bedrooms offer ceiling fans and built-in robes with views of the backyard, and are serviced by the home's main bathroom equipped with the essentials.
Control the climate all year round with your ducted heating and cooling.
Stepping outside entertain friends and family with ease under your undercover and concreted entertaining area or on your separate decked alfresco. It's also the perfect spot to watch the kids running around inside the large secure backyard.
It's a tradie's delight with the 9m x 5m concreted and powered shed with separate toilet.
Unique to this property is its abundance of storage options including a separate room off the patio, another inside the shed and a handy 5m x 3.5m garden shed.
A single carport and water tank complete the rest of the outdoor features.
Claim your slice of quiet living while still being close to schools, parks, shops, amenities and a quick 5-minute drive to Bendigo CBD.
Whether you are looking to enter to market as a first home buyer or a family ready to move in, this property ensures optimal investment happiness.
Internal area
298m²

Description:
SOLD OFF MARKET - FANTASTIC FAMILY SPACE & LIFESTYLE
SOLD OFF MARKET By Jayden Donaldson
Located on a sizeable allotment and within walking distance to supermarket, bakery, post office, school, childcare, golf course and train station, is this neat and tidy family home. With a fully landscaped front and rear garden, this property is move-in ready and absolutely perfect for entertaining.
The main entry opens, on one side, to a large master bedroom with ceiling fan, walk-in robe and ensuite. A second bedroom next door features a built-in robe and ceiling fan and would also serve as a fantastic nursery or home office. Across the hall is a large formal lounge with ceiling fan.
At the end of the entry hall is a spacious and light-filled open plan kitchen, living and dining room. Designed in a timeless, modern country style, the kitchen includes ample storage, and a door from the double garage provides easy access when arriving home with groceries. Off the living area is a hallway to the remaining two bedrooms, both with ceiling fan and built-in robe, along with a family bathroom, separate toilet, and a laundry with door to the rear yard.
Glass sliding doors from the kitchen area open out to a spacious alfresco. Overlooking lawn, established planting and a large in-ground swimming pool, the backyard is absolutely perfect for entertaining year-round. A roller door from the double garage opens to the rear yard and a side driveway, offering access and storage for a trailer, boat or extra vehicles. A large shed, garden shed and yard offer additional storage space and a great outdoor workspace.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling and ducted gas heating
Ceiling fans throughout
Split system in main living
Kitchen appliances including four-burner electric cooktop, oven and dishwasher
Shed (6m x 4m)
Storage shed
In-ground swimming pool (10m x 4m, solar heated and salt chlorinated with glass fence)
Secure access to rear yard from the front
So close to all amenities and sitting on a spacious block, everything has been considered with this neat and tidy home. Move in, sit back and relax this property is ideal for a family seeking easy living, or for a downsizer still wanting plenty of space and an excellent home to entertain in.

Description:
1411M2 WITH BUSHLAND OUTLOOK
Positioned on a flat allotment overlooking California Gully Bushland Reserve, the lot is fully fenced and comes complete with a building envelope.
All services are available, the property is partially treed and is positioned so you can build with a northerly aspect and take in views towards the reserve. The lot is partially treed and offers scope of a fantastic alfresco space looking towards the bush reserve.
It is a lovely private location only five mins drive to Bendigo's CBD, it is handy to transport and there is plenty of room for the kids to play or a turning circle for larger vehicles.
This is a one-off lot in a fantastic established, yet private location with an existing building envelope ripe for building on now!!

Description:
Little Epsom Gem in a Great Location
Suitable for first home buyers, investors or downsizers alike. This modern three-bedroom, two-bathroom duplex property is sure to turn a few heads!
Step inside and be greeted with a central hallway with the master bedroom on the right, complete with walk in robe and three-piece ensuite. The left side of the hallway hosts bedrooms two and three both with built-in robes. There is a study alcove adjacent to the main bathroom, which is just another great feature of this fantastic property.
The rear of the property opens up into a spacious open plan living space, with a kitchen that features an island bench, a 900mm free standing stainless steel stove, dishwasher, microwave nook and an abundance of storage. Complimented by external access to the private outdoor courtyard which also has side access to Cooba Drive.
The property features ducted heating and split system air-conditioning throughout and a single car garage with remote door and internal access. Conveniently located only a three-minute drive to Epsom Village, and a four-minute drive to Jenny's Early Learning Centre.
Contact Toby Gray to discuss further on 0468 708 785.
(ENOE)

Description:
Your Dream Location on 2 Acres
Why wait for another allotment to come along, when this is what you have been searching for ?
Zoned Low Density Residential, this can be used for your home location now, or land bank for future development.
This is your opportunity to secure a fantastic semi-rural parcel of land in the ever-growing suburb of Epsom.
This cleared allotment has services available including town water, phone and power.
With the convenience of a local train station, shopping centres and sporting grounds this land is perfectly positioned to allow flexibility when designing your family home.
